name: It's Mail Time!
description:
Have you ever Wondered what Would Happen if the Overcooked characters had to work as postmen?

It's Mail Time is a postman game focused on multiplayer inteeraction in the middle of Chaotic Scenario, the players will have to cooperate  to be able to fill the truck as  quickly as possible before time runs Out.

The alpha 1.0 version has

  • Multiplayer for two Players.
  • Tutorial.
  • Configuration.

How to Play

This game was made by

Thiago Moura - Game Design / 2D Artist.

Wladesson Guedes - 3d Artist.

Aryarjaj Alves - Programmer.

Carlos Juatan - Programmer.

Theme:  Local Super Heroes       Game category: PC.

City: Fortaleza    Country: Brasil.

Diversifier

Deadline Counted / Run-Run

Program

Unity Engine

Ever Wordered why your Deliveries are late? Let'a find olt.
